name: Bobby Gamble
description:
Probability Police

- D.I Gamble has been tipped off

- A local gang has been stockpiling luck

- Go and remind them the power of hard statistics 

Weapons of Chance Destruction

- Find unique weapons with their own dice

- Each shot the dice is rolled to decide damage

- From 6-sided cubed blasters to 20-sided Icosahedron launchers, Bobbys got it covered

Controls

- WASD/Arrow keys to move

- Point and click the mouse to fire/select

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 - Roll Of The Dice!
